snippet.title: Out Of Line - teaser
snippet.description:
Out of Line - PlayStation®4 teaser

Website - http://nerdmonkeys.pt/out-of-line/
Dev blog - https://sandevblog.tumblr.com/

Out of Line is an upcoming action-adventure videogame, winner of PlayStation® Talents Awards 2017 in the categories "Best Game" and "Press Award". Runner up in the categories "Most Innovative Game", "Best Art" and "Best Kids Game". Join little San spear driven adventure and help him and his brothers on their journey! Solve difficult puzzles, alongside action challenges in their quest to survive and escape the “factory”.

Nerd Monkeys® 2018
